property_title: Sea View 4+1 Bedroom Villa For Sale in  Lagos -
property_description:
This stunning five bedroom villa for sale is located in a quiet residential area of Lagos, within a short drive away from the city centre and an array of golden beaches. Recently built, this residence is the epitome of luxury, with its contemporary design and breathtaking sea and mountain views.

Spread across two floors, this villa comprises on the ground floor a welcoming entry hall, leading to a spacious living room in open plan with a dining area and a fully equipped kitchen. The kitchen features a modern island and connects seamlessly with a convenient utility area. 

This floor still offers a bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and a versatile room currently being used as a cinema room, but could easily serve as an additional bedroom. Upstairs, you’ll find three large bedrooms, each boasting their own en-suite bathroom, and private terraces offering amazing views.

Externally, this property offers a large swimming pool, complete with sunbeds and shower area, an ample terrace with a dedicated BBQ and dining area, and beautifully landscaped gardens all around the property.

Additional features include:air conditioning, underfloor heating, double glazed windows, fireplace, electric shutters, fitted wardrobes, solar panels, security alarm, air renewal system, laundry room and private parking.

Boasting prime location and breathtaking sea views, this property is situated just a couple minutes away from all necessary amenities, including restaurants, supermarkets, bars, cafes, etc. Within a short scenic drive, you will find a wide array of stunning golden beaches, such as Meia Praia, Praia Dona Ana, Praia do Camilo, and much more.

property_title: Luxury 2 bedroom Penthouse with Marina and Ocean views
property_description:
Luxury 2 bedroom Penthouse with Marina and Ocean views

If it's location, style, and a healthy dose of urban glam you're looking for, check out this spacious, 2 bedroom Penthouse in Lagos.

Located on the 5th floor of a five-storey building, on the outskirts of the city centre, it offers fantastic views of Lagos city and marina. Just a 5-minute walk from local amenities and public transport, this immaculate, 120.55 sqm apartment raises the benchmark for urban living.

The secure, modern complex features a gym with sauna, a heated indoor pool, and a large private outdoor pool-patio, all available year-round for residents’ use.

Flooded with natural light, the apartment boasts a dual-aspect view of Lagos' chic Marina and the secluded pool area. The open-plan living, dining, and kitchen area includes black composite quartz counter tops, sleek white units, a central island/breakfast bar and all kitchen appliances by Bosch.

The dining area easily fits a six-seater table; the lounge kitchen diner is all open plan and floor-to-ceiling patio doors, leading to a generous marina-facing terrace—perfect for entertaining with a gas BBQ and comfortable garden lounge and dining furniture - front the entire open living space.

The master bedroom includes an en-suite bathroom with a massage bathtub and patio doors opening onto the main terrace. The guest bedroom has a pool-facing terrace, and there’s a separate guest bathroom with a walk-in shower.

Modern conveniences such as electric blackout blinds, LED mood lighting, surround sound, Wi-Fi, and individually controlled underfloor heating enhance the property. A separate laundry and storage room lends convenience.

A 10-minute stroll brings you to Lagos Old city, with its diverse culinary scene, lively bars, and shops. Three supermarkets, a train station, bus station, and Lagos Marina are within a five-minute walk.

property_title: Exceptional Beachside 2 Bed  Apartment with Sea Views in Meia Praia, Lagos
property_description:
This top-floor apartment is ideally situated just 500 meters from the stunning expanse of Meia Praia beach, within the picturesque bay of Lagos — one of the Algarve’s most charming and historic coastal towns. Located only 1km from the award-winning Lagos Marina and within easy reach of the vibrant old town, the property offers a rare opportunity to enjoy the best of both relaxation and investment.

Inside, the apartment features a bright open-plan layout that combines a fully equipped kitchen and a comfortable living area, leading out to a private balcony with partial sea views. From this space, you can enjoy the sound of the ocean and soak up the Algarve sunshine in total comfort. The accommodation includes a spacious master bedroom, a second bedroom with twin beds and fitted wardrobes, and a modern bathroom finished to a high standard.

With an active Alojamento Local (AL) license and an impressive rental record in 2024, this property represents an excellent income-producing investment. Its prime location and proximity to one of the region’s most desirable beaches ensure strong demand from holidaymakers, particularly during the high season when prices and occupancy are at their peak. At the same time, the apartment serves as a perfect winter escape for owners wishing to enjoy the Algarve’s mild climate between November and April.

Set within a peaceful and well-maintained condominium of only two floors, the apartment benefits from minimal shared costs, making it an even more attractive long-term investment. The building is quiet, well-located, and just far enough from the busy tourist zones to offer peace while still being close to restaurants, shops, golf, and transport links.

Whether you’re looking for a holiday home, a lifestyle investment, or a profitable rental property with low overheads and year-round appeal, this sea-view apartment in Meia Praia offers it all.

property_title: Contemporary 2 bed  Ground Floor Flat  with Private Glass-Enclosed Terrace
property_description:
Contemporary 2-Bedroom Ground Floor Apartment with Glass-Enclosed Terrace in the Heart of Lagos

Discover the perfect blend of comfort, style, and location with this stunning 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom ground floor apartment, situated in one of Lagos most central and desirable residential areas. Offering an impressive gross area of 143.45 m², this property stands out for its intelligent layout, refined design, and exceptional lifestyle appeal.

The apartment features a spacious internal living area of 106.55 m², complemented by a bright and versatile glass-enclosed terrace and solarium measuring 36.90 m²  the perfect spot for year-round dining, lounging, or simply soaking up the Algarve sun.

Residents benefit from exclusive access to a rooftop swimming pool, a tranquil space with panoramic views, ideal for relaxing or enjoying a peaceful escape above the city.

Additional conveniences include a private garage of 18.00 m² and a secure storage room, providing ample space for personal belongings, bicycles, or beach essentials.

Set just 500 metres from the Lagos Hospital and the renowned Fish Market, this prime location also puts you within walking distance of cafés, supermarkets, and public transport, making it one of the most connected addresses in town. From here, some of the Algarves most iconic beaches are only minutes away, offering a dream setting for a holiday home or permanent residence.

Built by a respected local developer, this high-end apartment is equipped with advanced smart home technology, energy-efficient appliances, and premium finishes throughout  ensuring a lifestyle of comfort, security, and sustainability.

Whether you're searching for a stylish full-time residence, a holiday getaway, or a high-performing rental investment, this exceptional property in central Lagos ticks every box for quality, location, and value.

Contemporary 2-Bedroom Ground Floor Apartment with Glass-Enclosed Terrace in the Heart of Lagos

property_description:
Welcome to this exceptional 3-bedroom ground floor apartment, located in one of the most central and sought-after areas of Lagos, Algarve. Offering a generous internal area of 128.05 m², this elegant residence blends modern design with everyday comfort, perfect for permanent living, holiday use, or investment.

Step outside to your own private glass-enclosed terrace of 46.55 m², a tranquil extension of the living space ideal for entertaining or relaxing year-round. Residents of the building enjoy access to an exclusive rooftop swimming pool, offering panoramic views and a peaceful escape within the condominium.

Additional features include a private garage of 23.00 m² and a secure storage room, ensuring ample space for vehicles, bikes, or beach equipment.

Strategically located just 500 metres from the Lagos Hospital and the popular Fish Market, the apartment is within walking distance to supermarkets, cafés, and public transport connections. Surrounded by some of the most beautiful beaches in the Algarve, this is an ideal base for enjoying the best of coastal Portugal.

Constructed to high standards, the apartment is part of a premium development by a renowned builder, and features state-of-the-art smart home systems, energy-efficient appliances, and superior finishes throughout.

Whether you're looking for a stylish residence or a lucrative rental property in a prime Algarve location, this property offers unbeatable value, comfort, and lifestyle.

property_description:
Experience the height of luxury living in this exceptional three-bedroom apartment, a stylish urban oasis. Situated on the first floor of a modern, secure complex, the apartment is perfectly situated near the centre of Lagos

As you step inside, you're greeted by a spacious, open-plan living area designed for modern comfort and effortless entertaining. The sleek, fully equipped kitchen flows seamlessly into the elegant dining space and cozy lounge, all bathed in natural light thanks to large windows that frame the stunning vistas.

The apartment is equipped with underfloor heating and centralized air conditioning, both integrated discreetly into the ceilings, ensuring comfort throughout the year.

Step outside to the expansive main terrace ideal for alfresco dining while taking in the vibrant Lagos atmosphere.

The apartment boasts three generously sized bedrooms, including a luxurious master suite with its own en-suite bathroom featuring a massage bathtub. The two additional bedrooms share a secondary terrace with the master bedroom overlooking the sparkling swimming pool, an ideal spot to enjoy your morning coffee or unwind in the evening.

For those seeking a resort-style lifestyle, this property offers exceptional amenities, including a year-round gym, sauna, heated indoor pool, and a large outdoor pool-patio. Additional modern conveniences such as a central vacuum system, surround sound, and electric blinds controlled by a central button enhance the apartment’s luxurious feel.

A key highlight is the peace of mind that comes with two dedicated underground parking spaces and a private storage room, providing ample space for all your belongings. The apartment is perfectly located within walking distance of local shops, public transport, and the vibrant city center, giving you easy access to the best that Lagos has to offer while also providing a serene, elevated retreat at the end of the day.

This extraordinary apartment is the ideal blend of urban convenience and peaceful, living. Don't miss the opportunity to call it home.

property_title: Exclusive  Apartment – 3 Bedrooms, Rooftop Pool & Sea Views
property_description:
Welcome to your new home in the heart of Lagos, Algarve. This brand-new 3-bedroom apartment, located in the exclusive Palm Residence, is now fully completed and ready for immediate handover. Constructed by the highly regarded AJ Viegas Construção, the apartment reflects a commitment to premium quality and high construction standards.

The property offers three spacious and bright bedrooms, two elegant bathrooms, and a modern kitchen fitted with top-quality appliances. Designed for comfort and energy efficiency, it features underfloor heating, a multi-split air conditioning and heating system, and solar thermal panels for hot water. Ventilation is naturally regulated through the windows, with air circulation supported by exhaust systems in the bathrooms and kitchen, and night-time cooling made possible by well-placed glass openings.

With a generous 46.10m² of wraparound balconies, the apartment provides a sunny and private space for outdoor dining and relaxation. On the rooftop, residents have exclusive access to a spectacular swimming pool with panoramic sea views, offering the perfect place to unwind and enjoy the Algarve sunshine. The property also includes a private underground garage space of 19.10m² and a secure storage unit on the lower level.

Located centrally in Lagos, this apartment is just moments from the vibrant fish market, a short walk to the historic old town, and surrounded by some of the most iconic beaches in the region, including Meia Praia and Praia Dona Ana. With excellent access to cultural attractions, a variety of restaurants, nightlife, and marine tourism activities, it is the ideal setting for either permanent living or holiday use. Whether youre searching for a high-quality family home, a luxurious coastal retreat, or an investment property in the Algarve, this residence offers an exceptional opportunity in one of southern Portugals most desirable coastal towns.
